about_the_game:
About the Game:

Soar in Wedgetail®, a free-to-play hero shooter in the skies where unique pilots engage in intense aerial battles. Team up with friends for strategic combat or take on challenging missions. Each pilot has distinct abilities and weapons, ready to dominate futuristic scenarios.

Key Features:

  • Unique Pilots: Choose from a growing roster of pilots, each with special abilities and compelling stories.
  • Team Combat: Engage in high-intensity battles on dynamic maps with modes like Capture the Point and Team Deathmatch.
  • Progression and Customization: Unlock new pilots, skins, and aircraft each season.
  • Free-to-Play, Always Online: Wedgetail® constantly evolves with new content and updates.

Join our community and participate in exclusive playtests and pre-launch tournaments!
detailed_description:
About the Game:

Soar in Wedgetail®, a free-to-play hero shooter in the skies where unique pilots engage in intense aerial battles. Team up with friends for strategic combat or take on challenging missions. Each pilot has distinct abilities and weapons, ready to dominate futuristic scenarios.

Key Features:

  • Unique Pilots: Choose from a growing roster of pilots, each with special abilities and compelling stories.
  • Team Combat: Engage in high-intensity battles on dynamic maps with modes like Capture the Point and Team Deathmatch.
  • Progression and Customization: Unlock new pilots, skins, and aircraft each season.
  • Free-to-Play, Always Online: Wedgetail® constantly evolves with new content and updates.

Join our community and participate in exclusive playtests and pre-launch tournaments!
name: WEDGETAIL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 ou equivalente
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 ou equivalente
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 ou superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 ou superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Take to the skies in Wedgetail®, the free-to-play 4v4 hero shooter where unique pilots engage in high-intensity aerial battles. Compete in eSports team-based combat, missions, and customize your experience. Join our community to participate in playtests and exclusive pre-launch tournaments!
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
